bug.author: fawazahmed0
bug.summary: USE QnA Model Examples doesn't work
bug.description:
The examples for Universal Sentence Encoder for question answering (USE-QA) model, doesn't seem to work. I tried examples at <denchmark-link:https://tfhub.dev/google/tfjs-model/universal-sentence-encoder-qa-ondevice/1>tfhub</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://www.npmjs.com/package/@tensorflow-models/universal-sentence-encoder>npmjs</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs-models/tree/master/universal-sentence-encoder>Github</denchmark-link> , none of them works and two of them fails with a different error in console
<denchmark-link:https://codepen.io/fawazahmed0/pen/ZEWdYpV>CodePen</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: I think the docs are out of date. I tried it and it looks like model.embed does not return a promise (it synchronously returns the embeddings). Here is a version of your <denchmark-link:https://codepen.io/tafsiri/pen/vYGqEbJ>codepen with the fix</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pyu10055>@pyu10055</denchmark-link> could you review and update the api docs/examples for useQnA mentioned above.

Are you satisfied with the resolution of your issue? <denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaP12TRhd9xSxjXZjcZFNXPGk4kc1-qMdv3gc6bEP90vY1ew/viewform?entry.85265664=Yes&entry.2137816233=https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs/issues/3996>Yes</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaP12TRhd9xSxjXZjcZFNXPGk4kc1-qMdv3gc6bEP90vY1ew/viewform?entry.85265664=No&entry.2137816233=https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs/issues/3996>No</denchmark-link>
Only Github example seems to be updated though
